verses.verse: Oh give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name<s%>; Make <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> his <S%H5949>doings<s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H2167>him<s%>, sing praises unto <S%H7878>him<s%>; Talk ye of all his marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>: Let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> ye <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength<s%>; <S%H1245>Seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>evermore<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvellous <S%H6381>works<s%> that he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>, His <S%H4159>wonders<s%>, and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>,
O ye <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, Ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, his chosen <S%H972>ones<s%>.
He is <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>: His <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
He hath <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, The <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>,
The covenant which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, And his <S%H7621>oath<s%> unto <S%H3446>Isaac<s%>,
And <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>statute<s%>, To <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>,
Saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, The <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>;
When they were but a few <S%H4962>men<s%> in <S%H4557>number<s%>, <S%H4592>Yea<s%>, very few, and sojourners in <S%H1481>it<s%>.
And they <S%H1980>went<s%> about from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H4467>nation<s%>, From one kingdom to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.
He <S%H3240>suffered<s%> no <S%H120>man<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong<s%>; <S%H3198>Yea<s%>, he reproved kings for their <S%H4428>sakes<s%>,
Saying <S%H5060><s%>, Touch not mine <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H5030>ones<s%>, And do my prophets no <S%H7489>harm<s%>.
And he <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H7458>famine<s%> upon the <S%H776>land<s%>; He <S%H7665>brake<s%> the whole <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3130>them<s%>; Joseph was <S%H4376>sold<s%> for a <S%H5650>servant<s%>:
His <S%H7272>feet<s%> they <S%H6031>hurt<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters<s%>: <S%H5315>He<s%> was <S%H935>laid<s%> in chains of <S%H1270>iron<s%>,
Until the <S%H6256>time<s%> that his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H565>pass<s%>, The word of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> tried <S%H6884>him<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H5425>loosed<s%> <S%H4910>him<s%>; Even the ruler of <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, and let him go <S%H6605>free<s%>.
He <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H113>lord<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, And <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of all his <S%H7075>substance<s%>;
To <S%H631>bind<s%> his <S%H8269>princes<s%> at his <S%H5315>pleasure<s%>, And teach his <S%H2205>elders<s%> <S%H2449>wisdom<s%>.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>.
And he <S%H6509>increased<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>, And made them <S%H6105>stronger<s%> than their <S%H6862>adversaries<s%>.
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, To deal <S%H5230>subtly<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> whom he had <S%H977>chosen<s%>.
They <S%H7760>set<s%> among them his <S%H226>signs<s%>, And <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%>.
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, and made it <S%H2821>dark<s%>; And they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> not against his <S%H1697>words<s%>.
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H4325>waters<s%> into <S%H1818>blood<s%>, And <S%H4191>slew<s%> their <S%H1710>fish<s%>.
Their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8317>swarmed<s%> <S%H8317>with<s%> <S%H6854>frogs<s%> In the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings<s%>.
He <S%H559>spake<s%>, and there <S%H935>came<s%> swarms of <S%H6157>flies<s%>, And <S%H3654>lice<s%> in all their <S%H1366>borders<s%>.
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1259>hail<s%> for <S%H1653>rain<s%>, And <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>.
He <S%H5221>smote<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> also and their <S%H8384>fig-trees<s%>, And <S%H7665>brake<s%> the <S%H8384>trees<s%> of their <S%H1366>borders<s%>.
He <S%H559>spake<s%>, and the <S%H697>locust<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, And the <S%H3218>grasshopper<s%>, and that without <S%H4557>number<s%>,
And did eat <S%H398>up<s%> every <S%H6212>herb<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>, And did <S%H398>eat<s%> up the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H127>ground<s%>.
He <S%H5221>smote<s%> also all the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> in their <S%H776>land<s%>, The <S%H7225>chief<s%> of all their <S%H202>strength<s%>.
And he brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>; And there was not one <S%H3782>feeble<s%> person among his <S%H7626>tribes<s%>.
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H3318>departed<s%>; For the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of them had fallen upon <S%H5307>them<s%>.
He <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> for a <S%H4539>covering<s%>, And <S%H784>fire<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>.
They <S%H7592>asked<s%>, and he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quails<s%>, And <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
He <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out<s%>; They <S%H1980>ran<s%> in the dry <S%H6723>places<s%> like a <S%H5104>river<s%>.
For he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%>, And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
And he brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H8342>joy<s%>, And his <S%H972>chosen<s%> with <S%H7440>singing<s%>.
And he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H776>lands<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>; And they took the <S%H5999>labor<s%> of the <S%H3816>peoples<s%> in <S%H3423>possession<s%>:
That they might <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes<s%>, And <S%H8104>observe<s%> his <S%H8451>laws<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
